summary: This mod simply adds an invisible ring, that uses Slot 52 - as does the Schlong by SOS - to manualy avoid clipping with custom armors.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b]Slot 52 Ring[/b] for use with SOS and custom armors[/center]

[b]How it works:[/b]
SOS - Schlongs of Skyrim uses Slot 52 for their Schlong. My problem was the clipping when wearing custom armors. While I really love this mod this bugged me a bit.

This mod adds a Ring that uses nothing but Slot 52 and will be invisible ingame, so your normal ring won\'t be unequipped. The schlong vanishes and doesn\'t hang through the armor anymor.

To get the Schlong back you simply unequip the ring again.


[b]Where to find?[/b]
- Open your console
- type: help Slot
- find: ARMOR (XXXXXXX) \"Slot 52\"
- type: player.additem XXXXXXX 1

Now the Ring is in your inventory, equip it and dance.


[b]What else?[/b]
This mod is senseless if you\'re not using the wonderful [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35463/?]SOS - Schlongs of Skyrim[/url] mod

This mod isn\'t very innovative and is intended to be as option until something better comes the way.
author: Harodath
